A

allowedLicenses - Variable in class com.googlecode.maven.licensevalidator.LicenseValidateMojo
List of banned licenses - any entry can be a RegExp match string instead of a specific license name.
allowedUnlicensed - Variable in class com.googlecode.maven.licensevalidator.LicenseValidateMojo
List of artifacts which are allowed as long as they do not assert a license, of the form groupId:artifactId, or a RegExp match string instead of a specific dependency name (which will be matched against the artifacts by forming their groupId and artifactId as above.
allowUnrecognised - Variable in class com.googlecode.maven.licensevalidator.LicenseValidateMojo
Whether to treat unmatched license dependencies as allowed or banned - true for allowed.

B

bannedLicenses - Variable in class com.googlecode.maven.licensevalidator.LicenseValidateMojo
List of banned licenses - any entry can be a RegExp match string instead of a specific license name.

F

failFast - Variable in class com.googlecode.maven.licensevalidator.LicenseValidateMojo
Whether to bomb out on the first license error or report all errors before exiting

LicenseValidateMojo - Class in com.googlecode.maven.licensevalidator
